solutionBody: So you are feeling upset, Try exercising to reduce stress levels!

Here's something to cheer you up.. Did you know Sea Otters hold hands when they sleep?

Your smile can heal thousands; but your anger can kill millions. Your hand-shake can encourage tens of people while your finger-pointing can turn ten thousands away from you! By Israelmore Ayivor
Feeling good today, huh? Well here's a fun fact to keep you in good spirits... Did you know that what a goat sounds like heavily depends on the region they grow up in, just like humans.
Someday, everything will make perfect sense. So for now, laugh at the confusion, smile through the tears, and keep reminding yourself that everything happens for a reason.
Nothing diminishes anxiety faster than action.
It's a great day! Smiling is known to reduce stress so keep it up!
Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles.
Stress is an ignorant state. It believes that everything is an emergency. Nothing is that important.
Life is so short. The only person you hurt when you stay angry or hold grudges is you. Forgive everyone, including yourself. By Tom Giaquinto
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
What do you call a pig that does karate? A pork chop!
Feeling anxious? Try putting an ice pack on your stomach for a few minutes!
We cant control what people say, but we do have a say in how we react. Refusing to give others power over our feelings is a mark of emotional intelligence.
